title: FS: T206 Wildfire Schulte (Front view) SGC 84, **SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Wildfire Schulte (Front view) SGC 84, **SOLD**
posts.post_content: Hands down one of the toughest commons to find in high grade, only 9 PSA 6's of all backs in the pop. report. This card features razor sharp corners, snow white borders, and would not look out of place in an 88 holder. $1750 delivered, thanks. Priced now at $1575. CARD now longer available....
Need X-Mas money, price reduced to $1575...This card is absolutely razor sharp...
Schulte is still available. Had a couple of emails pertaining trades, would possibly entertain them, thanks...
